definition: to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash

sentences.english: The ventilation fan switch on the button panel does not work here.
sentences.chinese: 掣板上的抽風機開關掣在這裏並不能運作。

sentences.english: The exhaust fan has external motor and aluminum alloy blades, is explosion resistant and safe.
sentences.chinese: 抽風機是外置式電機，鋁合金風葉，防爆，安全。
